title: Will Bobby Return To American Idol? + Lunchbox's Prank Calls Using Company Slogans + Darius Rucker On A News Station Disrespecting Him
itunes:title: Will Bobby Return To American Idol? + Lunchbox's Prank Calls Using Company Slogans + Darius Rucker On A News Station Disrespecting Him
description:
Bobby addresses whether or not he will return to American Idol next season. Lunchbox calls up companies and uses their own slogans during phone pranks. Darius Rucker calls into to talk about his new song, Hootie and the Blowfish and how he felt disrespected by a news station.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
